Skills.mat: Increases affinity when stamina is full.|While active, increases affinity by 10%.|While active, increases affinity by 20%.|While active, increases affinity by 30%.

Skills.ice: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.|Ice Resistance +6|Ice Resistance +12|Ice Resistance +20. Defense +10.

Skills.dig: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.|While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.|While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.|While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

Skills.1blr: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boost ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.|Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boost ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

Skills.1bos: Increases max bow charge level by one.|Increases max bow charge level by one.

Skills.blty: Allows you to apply blast coatings.|Lets you use blast coating.

Skills.par: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.|Part damage +10%|Part damage +20%|Part damage +30%

Skills.det: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.|Defense +5|Defense +10|Defense +15|Defense +20. All Elemental Resistances +3.|Defense +25. All Elemental Resistances +3.|Defense +30. All Elemental Resistances +3.|Defense +35. All Elemental Resistances +3.

Skills.afg: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.|Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.
Skills.ree: Increases evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.|While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

Skills.inr: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. Skills.hey: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.|Firepower +10%|Firepower +20%

Skills.aie: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.|Jumping attack power +10%

Skills.blee: Grants protection against bleeding.|Reduces damage while Bleeding.|Greatly reduces damage while Bleeding.|Prevents Bleeding.
Skills.frl: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.|Activates 25% of the time.
Skills.hoo: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.|Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.
